cgmp.disable-gm-as-pc-s: Disable GM from speaking as PC token
cgmp.disable-gm-as-pc-l: Make all chats GM says as PC into out of character chats, except rolls.
cgmp.whisper-hidden-tokens-l: Whisper all chats from hidden tokens to GM, including rolls.
cgmp.disable-chat-recall-l: Disable chat recalls by up and down arrow keys, so these keys can be used to move the text cursor.
